column5: HI. I'm new to the forum but I've learned lots already from reading posts but I still have a question about lake simcoe lakers. how far would one have to travel to reach them? I will be walking btw. I understand that it will be a bit far but I wanna know just how far. 1-2k? any information helps. thanks!
Lots of places in Kempenfelt Bay to access lakers without a crazy walk.
10 or 15 minute walk if the conditions are good.
Best is to buy a map and look for deep water closest to shore. There are a few places where there is 80fow relatively close.  Cheers, Ron...
Yep get a good map and if you dont see anyone out there dont go!!!
Sometimes it's the walk to the lake, or from, that's the hard part.
